name: Mighty Lube® Type SS3
description: Mighty Lube® Type SS3 is a thin film, anti-wear lubricant formulated to perform under the most demanding of conveyor applications. Specifically formulated for the coating industry, Type SS-3 shows high lubricicity and excellent paint and powder compatibility. Type SS-3’s water dispersion qualities make it ideal on wash lines and other locations where moisture can be a problem. Mighty Lube Type SS-3 is indicated anywhere maximum chain life is desired at temperatures of up to 500+°F.
